location_not_present:
Warning, the location '{place}' is not present in the locations' list. Make sure you have not mistaken.
You can find the list of locations in the file locations.json
description_too_long:
Warning, the description of the marker with id {id} is longer than 300 characters.
You may try to combine the timestamps so that the name of the student/group is mentioned only once in this marker.
